long_description: clapham pottery is a busy self-funding and not-for-profit community pottery, offering pottery classes for all ages and abilities. sunday classes for adults are available on a monthly basis. clapham pottery classes are taught by professional, working potters from the north street potters, which was established in clapham in 1978. we also offer family activities. whatever your ability, everyone is welcome at clapham pottery. children are taught how to make and decorate unique pieces, using a range of pottery techniques. in every class, you are taught by trained pottery teachers to work through the process of making your own pieces.

generated_description: clapham pottery, legally known as clapham pottery ltd., is a community pottery organization based in london, england. established in 1978, it operates as a self-funding and not-for-profit entity. the organization offers pottery classes for all ages and abilities, taught by professional, working potters from north street potters. classes include taster sessions, term courses, and family workshops, focusing on various pottery techniques. the classes are designed to cater to both adults and children, providing opportunities for learning and creativity.
